formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Primary equation (LaTeX): \( C_{1} \cdot V_{1} = C_{2} \cdot V_{2} \) Solving for stock volume: \( V_{1} = \dfrac{C_{2} \cdot V_{2}}{C_{1}} \) Diluent volume: \( V_{\text{diluent}} = V_{2} - V_{1} \) Dilution factor: \( \mathrm{DF} = \dfrac{C_{1}}{C_{2}} \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
